headline: UFS_UAT_CR6_ITSM_942417_SC_001_TC_001_Verification of Tabs
description: Verify that the user can be able to see the new tab of Docu Sign.
Step: Load the IB Application.
expected result: User should be able to launch the IB application Successfully .

Step: Check Docu Sign tab is available on the top of IB Application.
expected result: Docu Sign tab should be available in the IB Application.

headline: UFS_UAT_CR6_ITSM_942417_SC_001_TC_002_Verification of Tabs
description:
Verify the below options are available when clicking on the docu sign tab.
1.Church Organisations
2.Ministers and Staff
3.Personal,Company,Trust and others
4.Ethical Managed fund clients
Step: Load the IB Application.
expected result: User should be able to launch the IB application Successfully .

Step: Check Docu Sign tab is available on the top of IB Application.
expected result: Docu Sign tab should be available in the IB Application.

Step: Click on the docu sign tab and check the drop down options are available or not.
expected result: All the options should be available under the docu sign tab.

headline: UFS_UAT_CR6_ITSM_942417_SC_002_TC_003_Verification of dropdown list.
description:
Verify the below options are available when clicking on the church organisations tab.
1.Additional Cardholder Request
2.Application for Uniting Online
3.Card Limit Adjustment Request
4.Change of Daily Limit
5.Change of Details
6.Change to Authorised Signatories
7.Direct Debit Request
8.Investment Application
9.Loan Application
10.Periodic Payment Application
11.Schofield Loan Application
12.Sweep Facility Application
Step: Load the IB Application.
expected result: User should be able to launch the IB application Successfully .

Step: Check Docu Sign tab is available on the top of IB Application.
expected result: Docu Sign tab should be available in the IB Application.

Step: Click on church organisations tab and verify all the options are available under the dropdown list.
expected result: All the options should be available under the church organisations tab.

headline: UFS_UAT_CR6_ITSM_942417_SC_003_TC_007_Verification of hyperlinks accessible
description: Verify the user can be able to access the form when clicking on the Additional Cardholder Request tab under church organisation.
Step: Load the IB Application.
expected result: User should be able to launch the IB application Successfully .

Step: Check Docu Sign tab is available on the top of IB Application.
expected result: Docu Sign tab should be available in the IB Application.

Step: Click on Church organisation tab
expected result: Drop down list should be loaded successfully

Step: Click on Additional Cardholder Request Tab
expected result: Form loaded successfully on the next tab.

Step: Verify the provided link and the links accessed from IB DocuSign drop-down are same or not
expected result: Both links should be the same.
